ing: 2 cucumbers, peeled and cut into small pieces
des: "This summertime beauty and health drink is one of my favorite drinks in summer. Drink chilled to get refreshingly cool in the summer. It prevents dehydration in the body."
ins: Blend cucumbers, water, green chile pepper, mint, and salt together in a blender until juice is smooth. Pour juice into glasses and add 1 teaspoon lime juice to each glass.
